achievements.title: The Hero's Skull Badge
achievements.description: 100,000 soldiers die in battles with you - friends and foes

achievements.title: Nautical Star Emblem
achievements.description: Win 10 SP campaign naval battles

achievements.title: Hardened Veteran's Badge
achievements.description: Win 15 SP campaign land battles

achievements.title: Platinum Star of Glory
achievements.description: Win Gold in all historic battles

achievements.title: The Emblem of the Enlightened Society
achievements.description: Win a prestige victory

achievements.title: Grand General Star
achievements.description: Win Silver in 5 historic battles

achievements.title: The People's Crown
achievements.description: Have a 100% approval rating

achievements.title: The Seal of the Grand Coalition
achievements.description: Have 6 allies simultaneously

achievements.title: Diplomat's Pin
achievements.description: Make all major nations become Very Friendly towards you (in terms of diplomatic relations)

achievements.title: The Hand-and-Dagger on Black Chain
achievements.description: Assassinate 15 people

achievements.title: The Imperial Wreath
achievements.description: Conquer Europe

achievements.title: The Explorers' Society Badge
achievements.description: Cover 50,000 sea or land miles with your armies and fleets

achievements.title: The Medallion of the Imperial Psychopath
achievements.description: Declare war on all nations in the first turn, never make peace, and win the game

achievements.title: The Merchant Navy Medal of Gratitude
achievements.description: Gain 8,000 per turn in trade revenue

achievements.title: Shield of the Protector
achievements.description: Have 10 protectorates at 1 time

achievements.title: The Imperial School of Strategy Crest
achievements.description: Have 3 generals with full skill level in 1 campaign

achievements.title: Historians' College Acknowledgement Badge

achievements.title: The Ribbon of the Promising Strategist

achievements.title: Marksman Brooch
achievements.description: Win 10 pistol duels

achievements.title: Imperial Fencing Academy Master's Needle
achievements.description: Win 10 sword duels

achievements.title: The Silver Dromedary Legionnaire

achievements.title: The Lion and Sabres Medal
achievements.description: Win any campaign without a single auto-resolved battle

achievements.title: The Bronze Armchair of Comfort

achievements.title: Russian Doll on Green Ribbon

achievements.title: The Imperial Crown on Brocade Band

achievements.title: Quadriga in Prussian Silver

achievements.title: Bronze Tower of Pisa

achievements.title: Hero of Arcole Commemorative Medal

achievements.title: The Silver Olive Chaplet

achievements.title: The Tireless Watchman Brooch
achievements.description: Play the game for 10 hours in total

achievements.title: Palace Guard Pendant
achievements.description: Play the game for 30 hours in total

achievements.title: The Eye of the Ever-watchful General
achievements.description: Play the game for 50 hours in total

achievements.description: Start any campaign, battle, or historical battle

achievements.title: Veteran's Badge of Service
